channel.title: Sqvrltastic Art Archive
channel.description: Hi, I'm sqvrltastic and I'm a digital artist. Welcome to my website! This is my main place for posting my artwork and sharing my thoughts.

item.title: I wish more artist had a personal website... [blog]
item.description: Rambly blog post about wishing for a more human, more enriching web for artists specifically.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Deleted and added some new links. Changed a bit the “buttons” page; also, I no longer allow hotlinking of my images. Added “artwork” and “blog” tags to RSS items so they are easier to filter out in case you want to. Implemented some minor code improvements regarding the way images are embedded on this website. All in all, nothing major, mostly just polishing work.

description.p: Legend of the Galactic Heroes fan art; portrait of Reinhard von Lohengramm.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Updated my “Full guide to RSS”; added a small section at the bottom about on how to make your RSS feed autodiscoverable. Additionally, added some cool new sites in the “links” section. Oh and, you can now find the HUGO source files of this website on my GitHub, if you ever wondered how I made this site the way I did.

item.title: Website update
item.description: I completely remade the template for the RSS news feed and the site’s own updates feed. Well, mostly on the developer side, you yourself won’t see many differences. Basically I made a template in HUGO and automated it, whereas previously I would code it by hand, which was pretty tedious and prone to making mistakes. Make sure to clear your reader’s cache if you have any issues! Also, now every artwork has a small annotation below!

item.title: Website update
item.description: Deleted two blog posts (I just didn’t like them, I feel like they were too low effort). Changed my whole gallery template in HUGO to make it fully automated. This shouldn’t affect anything too much for the end user though so you won’t see many changes. Fixed some broken links, changed some stuff, yada yada, the usual. Not worth mentioning here.

item.title: How to subscribe to this website — a guide [blog]
item.description: A guide on how to subscribe with RSS to Sqvrltastic Art Archive to get updates when I post new content or update this site.

item.title: Website update
item.description: My PC is still broken… (update: it’s fixed now). In the meantime, I rewrote and cleaned up a lot of CSS code on the website. For you this mostly means that there are some minor layout changes. Also, I added a big RSS feed button down in the footer section and a simple guide on how to subscribe to this website’s updates right there as well. So if you haven’t figured out how to do it already, hopefully how you will!

item.title: Website update
item.description: Minor website CSS changes! Just trying to make this website easier on the eyes. Also, I kept the main font being monospace, but now it will show as whatever default monospace font you have in your browser, not as Courier New like before. Additionally, updated coding resources links and added “Images: figcaption vs alt. text” link under accessibility section.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Crazy to think that January is already ending. But, in any case, in today’s update I added a whole new section to my website: “Links”! I will be sharing other indie websites there, as well as resources that I find useful and just cool and funny stuff!

item.title: Markdown cheat sheet [blog]
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language that lets you add formatting elements to plaintext documents. Its main advantage is readability and simple syntax.
